channel.title: How do i price items in my shop?
channel.description:
i searched and didnt find anything.
i need to know how to price items, and price to sell them for. i cant find out how to do it. any help would be nice. thankyou.

item.title: How do i price items in my shop?
item.dc:creator: @JadeScape JadeScape
item.description:
@JadeScape wrote:

i aggree with drabuzis but if you dont understand that go and look for somthing that dosent cost anything and it will say

0 0 0 at the start
and then the first one is
low alch
2nd one is
shop price
3rd one is high alch

to get alches to work just add it to your server
and then change those and it will work
but i dont know how to make it when you alch it
turns the object into somthing els

Read full topic
item.source: How do i price items in my shop?

item.title: How do i price items in my shop?
item.dc:creator: @drabuzis drabuzis
item.description:
@drabuzis wrote:

go to item.cfg and find the item the item that u want to cahnge price there are numbers like

4.67264229473597 4.67264229473597 4.85427038587765

change it and the price gonna change i dont know but u need to cahgne excactly cuz it can change 100-200 gp or nothing
